title: Exclude print view from screenshot feature

requirements.summary: Ensure the print view page does not display or trigger any screenshot functionality when rendering bills
acceptanceCriteria: The print view page renders bills in classic text format only
No screenshot capture or image generation occurs on the print view route
Bills displayed for printing maintain the traditional receipt-style layout with proper formatting

file_operations.description: Remove or disable any screenshot capture, image generation, or canvas-based rendering logic from the print view page. Ensure that only the PrintBill component is rendered for classic text-based receipt display. Verify that no screenshot-related UI elements, buttons, or automated capture triggers are present in this view.

Review the print view route configuration to ensure no screenshot-related props, context providers, or feature flags are passed to PrintViewPage. Confirm that the print route remains isolated from any screenshot functionality that may exist elsewhere in the application.
